biotools.summary:
An interactive web application for prioritizing clinically implicated variants from genome sequencing data with ancestry composition.

Clinical Genome & Ancestry Report (CGAR) enables users to identify and prioritize phenotype-associated variants from genome sequencing with a user-friendly and interactive online platform.

bioschemas.name: Clinical Genome and Ancestry Report (CGAR)
